name: Write-Up: Assignment07
description:
1.  Game Screenshot

2.  Tell us what references you had to add to the MayaGeometryExporter project

I had add no references to MayaGeometryExporter.

3. Tell us what other projects depend on MayaGeometryExporter

I added no dependence on MayaGeometryExporter.

4. Tell us whether you exported the unused data (i.e. normals, tangents, bitangents) to your human-readable file or not. Explain why.

I didn't exported the unused data, because I don't use them in my project. I think we should always keep the data clean and as small as possible, so only export the data that needed.

5. Show a screenshot of you debugging your plug-in

6. Tell us what happens if you try to load a model with too many vertices.

I try to add a plane with a large amount of vertices, the game lagging for a bit in the beginning.

7. How to play

Up, Down,Left,Right to move object

F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, F6 to move Camera
